							We have something for everyone! 







 







 







 















Meet the teachers 













 








 











Dr. Karan Khanna 









 









4.75  









 









4 years with enguru 







“I embrace the notion that success is an ongoing journey.” 



Teaching is my passion, and I derive immense joy from witnessing my learners achieve their goals with enthusiasm. I embrace the notion that success is an ongoing journey, as expressed by Lily Tomlin’s quote: “The road to success is always under construction. 











 







Dr. Karan Khanna 



4 years with enguru 



4.75  







“I embrace the notion that success is an ongoing journey.” 



Teaching is my passion, and I derive immense joy from witnessing my learners achieve their goals with enthusiasm. I embrace the notion that success is an ongoing journey, as expressed by Lily Tomlin’s quote: “The road to success is always under construction. 














 











Tania Sen Gupta 









 









4.75  









 









7 years with enguru 







“I find joy in curating and customising content” 



…to meet the needs of my learners apart from delivering training in General and Business English, as well as Soft Skills and Personality Development skills.” 











 







Tania Sen Gupta 



7 years with enguru 



4.75  







“I find joy in curating and customising content” 



…to meet the needs of my learners apart from delivering training in General and Business English, as well as Soft Skills and Personality Development skills.” 














 











Manoj Sharma 









 









4.64  









 









4 years with enguru 







“I tailor my methods to meet individual needs.” 



Teaching English is my passion. I love witnessing the transformative power of education, making a positive impact on students’ lives, fostering an inclusive environment, constantly learning, and promoting cultural understanding. 











 







Manoj Sharma 



4 years with enguru 



4.64  







“I tailor my methods to meet individual needs.” 



Teaching English is my passion. I love witnessing the transformative power of education, making a positive impact on students’ lives, fostering an inclusive environment, constantly learning, and promoting cultural understanding. 














 











Radha Kandaswamy 









 









4.80  









 









4 years with enguru 







“In the realm of language learning, you are the authors of your own stories.” 



I am passionate about empowering learners through language. As a Cambridge-certified English and IELTS trainer, I strive to make a positive impact on my students’ language journeys. 











 







Radha Kandaswamy 



4 years with enguru 



4.80  







“In the realm of language learning, you are the authors of your own stories.” 



I am passionate about empowering learners through language. As a Cambridge-certified English and IELTS trainer, I strive to make a positive impact on my students’ language journeys. 














 











Nihala Javid 









 









4.72  









 









2 years with enguru 







“Success is no accident. It is hard work, perseverance, learning, studying, sacrifice, and most of all, love of what you are doing or learning to do.” 



I enjoy helping people speak. It’s amazing to inspire change! It feels good to touch their future and bring out the best in them.
